item.title: iWeb Buddy 1.6.4 Released!
item.description:
Lots of changes are going on around here!
iWeb Buddy has finally been approved for release via the Mac App Store. This has a few impacts:
1. Anyone who is interested in purchasing iWeb Buddy can now download it directly from the Mac App Store.
2. iWeb Buddy has been renamed to “Buddy for iWeb”. While this is unfortunate it is required by Apple to be in the Mac App Store.
3. We will no longer be offering iWeb Buddy for purchase directly from our website.
As always, if you run into any issues with this release, please let us know.
Changes since last build:
• Fixed a crashing bug when trying to retrieve page thumbnail images.
• This is probably the last release to support OS X 10.5 unless major bugs are discovered.
If you are an existing owner of iWeb Buddy then you can receive this latest update by checking for updates from within iWeb Buddy.
If you are new to iWeb Buddy, you can receive this update by downloading it from the Mac App Store.
Please enjoy this release of iWeb Buddy and report any issues you may find on our new support forum at http://help.zarrastudios.com.

item.title: iWeb Buddy 1.6.2 Released!
item.description:
As it always happens when we do a long awaited release; a few things show up right after we release it. iWeb Buddy 1.6.2 is available for download.
As always, if you run into any issues with this release, please let us know.



Changes since last build:
• Removed the obsolete Haloscan options.
• Removed the obsolete Google Analytics Urchin options.
• Updated Google Analytics to comply with the latest configurations.
• Logs are now emailed to Zarra Studios using Mail rather than our own mail servers. This should make it work for more people.
• Fixed a crashing bug when a site was repeatedly updated.
You can download the latest from here.
Please enjoy this release of iWeb Buddy and report any issues you may find on our new support forum at http://help.zarrastudios.com.

item.title: iWeb Buddy 1.6.1 Released!
item.description:
As it always happens when we do a long awaited release; a few things show up right after we release it. iWeb Buddy 1.6.1 is available for download.
As always, if you run into any issues with this release, please let us know.



Changes since last build:
• Improved OS X 10.7 Lion support.
• Social bookmarks are now available on all page types.
• Updated the German localization so that the functionality now matches the English version.
• Added an introductory window to help new users understand the application.
• iWeb Buddy is now disabled when iWeb is running to prevent conflicts and other issues.
• Addressed a crash that a few users were reporting.
• Various cosmetic changes.
You can download the latest from here.
Please enjoy this release of iWeb Buddy and report any issues you may find on our new support forum at http://help.zarrastudios.com.

item.title: iWeb Buddy 1.6 Released!
item.description:
It has been a while since the last release but 1.6 is now available! The primary focus of this release is to be Lion compatible. However there are some goodies in here for everyone.
As always, if you run into any issues with this release, please let us know.


Changes since last build:
• Improved OS X 10.7 Lion support.
• Social bookmarks are now available on all page types.
• Updated the German localization so that the functionality now matches the English version.
• Added an introductory window to help new users understand the application.
• iWeb Buddy is now disabled when iWeb is running to prevent conflicts and other issues.
• Various cosmetic changes.
You can download the latest from here.
Please enjoy this release of iWeb Buddy and report any issues you may find on our new support forum at http://help.zarrastudios.com.
